mapper.insert: insert into piaoke values( #{id}, #{cjsj}, #{xm}, #{zjhm}, #{zz}, #{xb}, #{mz}, #{csrq}, #{zjlx}, #{jg}, #{type}, #{last_rzsj}, #{last_lgmc}, #{last_lgbm}, #{last_fh}, #{count}, #{message} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cjsj=values(cjsj), zz=VALUES (zz), count=values(count), last_rzsj=VALUES(last_rzsj), last_lgmc=VALUES (last_lgmc), last_lgbm=VALUES (last_lgbm), last_fh=VALUES (last_fh)
